repnme.cdata!: Malagasy Republic - Port of Tamative Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The project is based on the master plan
            for the Port of Tamatave and consists of the extension of
            existing breakwater by about 225 meters; the construction of
            two new berths, transit sheds and warehouses; the provision
            of cargo-handling equipment, and of a new deepwater tanker
            mooring for petroleum tankers; and consultants'
            services for final engineering design and supervision, and
            technical assistance in management and accounting.
